extendedInfo.description: Watch TV in Full Screen.No ads in full screen mode. No additional paymentNo pluginThis is a simple collection of Italian, Brasilian, German and many more channels  with TV Guide.The links are also found in other similar app therefore the quality of the stream is the same.The app I created because the 'sick of all the other apps that claim payments for public open links or broken links and to have a viewing mode that also allows to see the notification bar.Modes:1) Vertical notification bar and channel list2) Horizontal full screenThe ability to access the videos and their quality may depend on the user's connection:- Geographical position (eg Italy / abroad)- Type of connection (eg WiFi/3G)- Provider of the connection- Quality of the line- Presence of proxy / firewallWith this app you can watch:Television, Italian TV, European Football, Euro 2012, Sports, Entertainment, News, Music, Movies, Live stream, rai, live channels...

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Nice app. Some channels work but some don\'t.
reviews.author: konan heney

reviews.title: For Italy only?
reviews.comment: Didn\'t work for me. Samsung Galaxy\'s3 - 3UK network
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says
reviews.comment: Requires a plugin that\'s easy to install, then it works as advertised. Some quirks with the interface cost the 5th star, but the app is very nice all considered.  Suggestions: -An optimized interface for 7\' screens. -Option to revert to window mode while in full screen. Currently, you can only go back to the channel list from there. -Check the channel filter. When you exit a channel and go back to the list, it reverts to \"all\" but the selection box doesn\'t reset visually.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: does not work at all
reviews.comment: gives notification saying cannot be played on all videos
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poro GUI and performance
reviews.comment: Seems only 2 channels works from abroad
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good effort
reviews.comment: Very good start. Definitely better than Iaculano\'s software and doesn\'t need any plugin. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dario
reviews.comment: Shame i have to give this 1 star because it doesn\'t work at all. I downloaded Vitamio as suggested by the app and all I get is a black screen. Xperia play.
